user.title: SunPower PVS WebSocket
user.description: Connect to your local SunPower PVS WebSocket.

data.enable_devicelist_scan: Scan DeviceList for lifetime & inverter data

data_description.host: The local IP address of your PVS (for example 172.27.x.x).
data_description.port: WebSocket port exposed by the PVS (default 9002).
data_description.enable_devicelist_scan: If enabled, the integration periodically calls DeviceList over HTTP to fetch lifetime energy and per‑inverter metrics.
data_description.consumption_measure: House usage (load): net = load − PV. Grid import: treat 'consumption' as grid import when a signed net isn't provided.
data_description.ws_update_interval: How often to publish state updates from the WebSocket (throttling). Increase to reduce recorder writes.
data_description.enable_ws_throttle: If enabled, sensors publish at most once per the interval above. If disabled, publish every WS message.
data_description.poll_interval: How often to poll DeviceList. Minimum 60 seconds. Higher values reduce traffic and DB writes.
